scripts.dev:client: rimraf ./dist & cross-env REMAX_APP_ENV=client remax build  -t wechat -w
scripts.dev:backstage: rimraf ./dist & cross-env REMAX_APP_ENV=backstage remax build -t wechat -w -m
scripts.build:client: rimraf ./dist & cross-env REMAX_APP_ENV=client  NODE_ENV=production remax build  -t wechat -w
scripts.build:backstage: rimraf ./dist & cross-env REMAX_APP_ENV=backstage  NODE_ENV=production remax build -t wechat -w -m
